PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-09032019-06-22FIN,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActProceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act, 2019
PrecisRegulations Amending Certain REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING ACT, 2019 in order to (1) strengthen Canada’s ability to combat money laundering and terrorist activity financing activities; (2) operationalize changes to the Act and close gaps in Canada’s Anti-Money Laundering and Anti-Terrorist Financing Regime; (3) help improve reporting entities’ compliance with regulatory requirements; (4) help improve the monitoring and enforcement efforts of Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada; (5) improve Canada’s compliance with international standards; and, (6) adopt minor technical changes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0240 Publication Date: 2019-07-10
AttachmentsAttachment
